attributes.action: make the secondary schools admissions system fairer to all applicants giving siblings places at the same secondary schools rather than having to be split up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many children are losing out on secondary school places due to the crazy allocations systems in use. It is unfair that siblings of existing secondary school pupils are not given places at the same secondary school as requested on their application form, but instead are at the mercy of their local authority admissions team.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
